amendment.description: Amendment reduces the Departmental Administration account under the Department of Energy by $10 million and increases the Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Departmental Administration account under the Department of Energy by $10 million and increase the Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A055) Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 210 (Roll no. 586).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A055) Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 210 (Roll no. 586).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A055) offered by Ms. Kaptur.
